channel.title: Making admins and pmods
channel.description: How do i do this on my server?

item.title: Making admins and pmods
item.dc:creator: @cowie cowie
item.description:
@cowie wrote:

omfg ? no talkin bout rep and he might not be using hybrid ?
maybe brains…or just put in a gmod make PLAYERNAME pmod make PLAYERNAME command ?
for all u no he cud need to edit it under playerrights in client.java ?

first post since i went away from priv servers!

Read full topic

item.title: Making admins and pmods
item.dc:creator: @monsha monsha
item.description:
@monsha wrote:

[quote=“hellboy, post:2, topic:15728”]lol open up the moparscape folder and press on hybrid scape and then from there go to characters and after that click on the person you wanna make a mod or admin and then go to the part where it says character-right = 0 or 1 and type 4 and then below it, it should say character-ismembers = 0 and there type 4 after that restart your server and play as that person or that person plays and they or you are mod=D[/quote] For start, normal player = 0, player mod = 1, staff mod = 2 and admin = 3. not 4 and with the character-is-member = 1, not 4, 1. now that thats done you will have to ask some1 to help with the playerhandler scripting and stuff…takes too long hope this helps REP++ pl0x lol pm me if you need more help

Read full topic

item.title: Making admins and pmods

item.description:
@hellboy wrote:

lol open up the moparscape folder and press on hybrid scape and then from there go to characters and after that click on the person you wanna make a mod or admin and then go to the part where it says character-right = 0 or 1 and type 4 and then below it, it should say character-ismembers = 0 and there type 4 after that restart your server and play as that person or that person plays and they or you are mod=D
